card.name: Acidic Slime
card.text: Deathtouch When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: AEther Adept
card.text: When AEther Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Air Servant
card.text: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

card.name: Ajani Goldmane
card.text: +1: You gain 2 life. -1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn. -6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

card.name: Ajani's Mantra
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Alluring Siren
card.text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

card.name: Ancient Hellkite
card.text: Flying {R}: Ancient Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls. Activate this ability only if Ancient Hellkite is attacking.

card.name: Angelic Arbiter
card.text: Flying Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures. Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Arc Runner
card.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Arc Runner.

card.name: Armored Ascension

card.name: Assassinate
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Augury Owl
card.text: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3.

card.name: Autumn's Veil
card.text: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.

card.name: Awakener Druid
card.text: When Awakener Druid enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as Awakener Druid remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.

card.name: Back to Nature

card.text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each turn if able.

card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Blood Tithe
card.text: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Bloodcrazed Goblin
card.text: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.

card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.text: Exile target black or red permanent.

card.name: Chandra Nalaar
card.text: +1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player. -X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature. -8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Chandra's Spitfire
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Clone
card.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Cloud Crusader

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.text: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Combust
card.text: Combust can't be countered by spells or abilities. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Conundrum Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever Conundrum Sphinx attacks, each player names a card. Then each player reveals the top card of his or her library. If the card a player revealed is the card he or she named, that player puts it into his or her hand. If it's not, that player puts it on the bottom of his or her library.

card.name: Corrupt
card.text: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Cudgel Troll
card.text: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll.

card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cyclops Gladiator
card.text: Whenever Cyclops Gladiator attacks, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature defending player controls. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to Cyclops Gladiator.

card.name: Dark Tutelage
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.text: Destroy all creatures.

card.text: You may pay 6 life and sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay Demon of Death's Gate's mana cost. Flying, trample

card.text: Each player sacrifices five lands. Destructive Force deals 5 damage to each creature.

card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.text: Gaea's Revenge can't be countered. Haste Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

card.name: Leyline of Punishment
card.text: If Leyline of Punishment is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Players can't gain life. Damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Leyline of Sanctity
card.text: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You have hexproof.

card.name: Leyline of the Void
card.text: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Leyline of Vitality
card.text: If Leyline of Vitality is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creatures you control get +0/+1. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.

card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
